name: EUR/USD
detail: Euro vs US Dollar – the most traded currency pair in the world.

name: USD/JPY
detail: US Dollar vs Japanese Yen – known for its liquidity and low spreads.

name: GBP/USD
detail: British Pound vs US Dollar – also called 'Cable', often volatile.

name: USD/CHF
detail: US Dollar vs Swiss Franc – considered a safe-haven currency pair.

name: AUD/USD
detail: Australian Dollar vs US Dollar – influenced by commodity prices.

name: USD/CAD
detail: US Dollar vs Canadian Dollar – often affected by oil price movements.

name: NZD/USD
detail: New Zealand Dollar vs US Dollar – reflects agricultural and commodity exports.
